name: test

categories: Default Category/Bathtubs,Default Category/Bathtubs/Freestanding Bathtubs,Default Category/Brands,Default Category/Brands/Aquatica
name: Aquatica AdoreMe 75" x 35" Freestanding Hybrid Acrylic-Composite Bathtub
description: Featuring the quintessential freestanding bath shape, the AdoreMe freestanding bathtub is the very essence of indulgence. The oval footprint extends outward and is capped by a rim that seems to fold over onto itself, providing a soft edge atop a substantial frame. The bathtub features a layer of special high-tech heat insulating material to preserve the water temperature. There is no single element of a bathroom that denotes style and elegance so succinctly as an Aquatica freestanding bathtub. Challenge the ordinary and soak in the luxury you deserve.

categories: Default Category/Bathtubs,Default Category/Bathtubs/Freestanding Bathtubs,Default Category/Brands,Default Category/Brands/Aquatica
name: Aquatica Cleopatra 61" x 61" Bathtub
description: Cleopatra was known for her utter dedication to decadence and Aquatica's Cleopatra corner bathtub follows suit. Making the very most of its shape, the outer edge bows sensuously out into the room, leaving an inner basin that is lavishly large, with a three petal shape for abundant space for one or a delicious bath de deux. There are few luxuries in life that revitalize the body and enhance the decor of your home at the same time. Lucky for you, Aquatica's Cleopatra bathtub will do just that.

categories: Default Category/Bathtubs,Default Category/Bathtubs/Freestanding Bathtubs,Default Category/Brands,Default Category/Brands/Aquatica
name: Aquatica Elise 67" x 32" Bathtub
description: Featuring a refreshed design for 2013, Elise is a designer stone bathtub named after the renowned Mozart's masterpiece "F r Elise". Aquatica's Elise bathtub was designed to maximize inner bathing space and accentuates a distinctive form which is easily observable from all angles. Most importantly, Elise is now part of our top-of-the line Sensuality collection which is made from the latest generation of state-of-the-art composite material featuring enhanced stain resistance and superb surface smoothness.

categories: Default Category/Bathtubs,Default Category/Bathtubs/Freestanding Bathtubs,Default Category/Brands,Default Category/Brands/Aquatica
name: Aquatica Emmanuelle 72" x 34" Slipper Tub
description: Like a spoon dipping delicately into a dish, Aquatica's "Emmanuelle" freestanding bathtub displays a graceful sweeping line. This stone slipper bath rises from a solid base to a delicate edge, all composed of a deliciously soft stone material. With the extended end of the basin resembling a stream slipping down into a river, the Emmanuelle is as pleasing to the eye as it is to soak in.

categories: Default Category/Bathtubs,Default Category/Bathtubs/Freestanding Bathtubs,Default Category/Brands,Default Category/Brands/Aquatica
name: Aquatica LoveMe 71" x 34" Freestanding EcoMarmor Slipper Tub
description: As personal and private as a song, the LoveMe freestanding bathtub offers the ideal size and shape for a deeply relaxing, deeply revitalizing bath. The basin shape is rectangular with comfortably rounded corners, but the rim sweeps upward on each end like the wings of a bird in flight. Settling in for a bath is an exercise in blissful escapism. There is no single element of a bathroom that denotes style and elegance so succinctly as an Aquatica freestanding bathtub. Challenge the ordinary and soak in the luxury you deserve.

categories: Default Category/Bathtubs,Default Category/Bathtubs/Freestanding Bathtubs,Default Category/Brands,Default Category/Brands/Aquatica
name: Aquatica PURESCAPE 39" x 39" Freestanding Acrylic Bathtub
description: Aquatica Purescape bathtubs are as pleasing to the eye as they are to soak in. Their striking visual appeal adds a mesmerizing modern elegance to any bathroom. From the finest selection of raw materials all the way to the high-class design, Aquatica has spared no expense to innovate and create some of the highest quality bathtubs in the world. There are few luxuries in life that revitalize the body and enhance the decor of your home at the same time. Lucky for you, Aquatica Purescape bathtubs do just that. Treat yourself and soak in peaceful tranquility with Aquatica's stylish and ergonomic PureScape 034 freestanding bathtub.

categories: Default Category/Bathroom Vanities,Default Category/Bathroom Vanities/Single-Sink Bathroom Vanities,Default Category/Brands/Avanity
name: Avanity Brentwood 49 in. Vanity Combo BRENTWOOD-VS49-NW-A
description: The Brentwood 49 in. vanity combo features a vanity with new luxurious walnut finish in a transitional styling that would complement any bathroom. Hand-crafted out of solid poplar wood and ash veneers. Dove tailed drawer box, soft-close doors & drawers are all standard features and finished with antique nickel door knobs. The vanity includes a black granite top and rectangular undermount sink. Coordinating mirrors are available to add to the set and complete this collection.

name: Antique 48" White Single Sink Bathroom Vanity
description:
Exquisite design and elegance make up this bathroom vanity. Solid wood construction in an antique white finish create a beautiful look to this bathroom vanity. There is a cream marfil marble countertop and ceramic undermount sink.

Please note: Faucet not included. 

Features Include:

    Two center doors and 8 side drawers for storage.
    Wood cabinet in antique white finish.
    Large back cutout for easy plumbing installation.
    Includes undermount ceramic sink and Cream Marfil marble countertop.
    Countertop has 3 predrilled holes for 8" widespread faucet.
    Fully assemble.

name: Malibu 60" Transitional Double Sink Bathroom Vanity in Grey
description:
An ideal complement to a contemporary decor, the 60 inch Malibu Double Sink Vanity embodies the clean edges and sophistication of modern design. The rich grey cabinet, made of solid oak lends a warm feeling to your bathroom that contrasts beautifully with the Carrara White Marble top. Sleek and simple brushed nickel hardware dresses up the European soft-closing sliders and doors, which give you ample space to store your bathroom items.
Features:
Adds contemporary flair to any space
Includes designer brushed nickel cabinet and drawer hardware
Spacious storage for toiletries
Allows for easy plumbing and faucet installation
Handcrafted and hand-finished
Cabinet made of solid oak wood, italian carrara white marble countertop
Soft closing brushed nickel hardware
*Faucets, backsplash and mirror are not included
Six (6) drawers, Four (4) doors
White undermount sinks
Mirror is not included

name: Erin 59" Transitional Double Sink Bathroom Vanity in White
description:
Splash a pleasant piece of charm onto the interiors of any bathroom with the Erin 59 inch Double Sink Bathroom Vanity Set. A gorgeous beauty, this impressive vanity set is presented by the well-known label Stufurhome. This traditional double sink vanity flaunts a timeless solid wood construction, while a serene soft finish takes its exquisiteness to another level. The overall look is further elevated with a smooth undermount porcelain basin that is charmingly complemented with a magnificent quartz countertop. Sleek and simple chrome hardware embellishes the cabinet door as well as providing a concealed shelf that gives ample space for a neat organization of bathroom essentials. Conceal the six pre-drilled holes by selecting a faucet as tasteful as the vanity’s character and add a cohesive styling element to this vanity.
Features:
Includes designer chrome cabinet hardware
Spacious storage for toiletries
Allows for easy plumbing and faucet installation
Solid wood construction
Rectangular undermount porcelain basin
DTC soft-closing doors
Chrome hardware
Quartz countertop
Six (6) pre-drilled faucet holes
Mirror, Backsplash, and Faucet not included

name: Erin 49" Modern Single Sink Bathroom Vanity
description:
Splash a pleasant piece of charm onto the interiors of any bathroom with the Erin 49 inch Single Sink Bathroom Vanity Set. A gorgeous beauty, this light yellow vanity set is presented by the well-known label Stufurhome. This traditional single sink vanity flaunts a timeless solid wood construction, while a serene soft finish takes its exquisiteness to another level. The overall look is further elevated with a smooth undermount porcelain basin that is charmingly complemented with a magnificent quartz countertop. Sleek and simple chrome hardware embellishes the cabinet door as well as providing a concealed shelf that gives ample space for a neat organization of bathroom essentials. Conceal the three pre-drilled holes by selecting a faucet as tasteful as the vanity’s character and add a cohesive styling element to this vanity. This model also comes with 31, 37, and 59 inch. 
Features:
Includes designer chrome cabinet hardware
Spacious storage for toiletries
Allows for easy plumbing and faucet installation
Solid wood construction
Rectangular undermount porcelain basin
DTC soft-closing doors
Chrome hardware
Quartz countertop
Three (3) pre-drilled faucet holes

Spruce up your bathroom decor with this smart and stylish Stufurhome Monte 25 Inch Corner Bathroom Vanity with Medicine Cabinet. Featuring smooth and neat lines, this Corner Bathroom Vanity offers a stylish solution to turn those unused bathroom corners into a fully functional one. You can store and hide your bathroom essentials in the bottom cabinet, lending a neat and organized look to your bathroom.
